review_data.content: Best sushi and Gyozas in Basel!! Great quality and fair price! I will repeat if I am there again!
Best sushi in town. Great taste, value for price. Love their summer tastes and crunchy prawn is a must. Highly reliable and fresh at all times.

The ice tea was great. I ordered the small poulet nudel soup. It was light and delicious. My friend also ordered a medium size sushi plate which you can see in the photos. It had crispy chicken inside one of them.

Very friendly staff and delicious food. The online booking is professional and you even gets a calendar entry with it.
We really enjoyed the fusion sushis and the gyoza. Highly recommend the restaurant.
Friendly staff.  Noodle soup was ok, sushi was good, infused water was refreshing.

Allways excellent.
I do recom the shushi bar.
Friendly service, easy going.
Well located as just at the entrance of the pedestrian area.
Walking distance to old town ant train station

The worst sushi I've ever had. So bad that a reasonable explanation might be that they purchase it at Coop and run it over. The fish was pre-sliced, leading to completely dry and flavorless 'sushi' and 'sashimi'. Two stars because my mixed drink was good, so I'll give credit where it's due. Also, terrible service. We ordered a round of drinks, a couple dishes, and grabbed a couple sushi train dishes. We were never asked if we wanted another round of drinks and sat for twenty minutes while we waited to be waited on before hailing down a different waitress for our bill. We had to ask for our bill three times and when we stood up to pay at the till (since they weren't exactly coming over to us to settle up and we saw another table pay at the till), they accosted us in the aisle as if we were going to leave without paying. Have no idea how they are rated above 4 stars...

All-time favorite so far! The soup was great. The dumplings and sushi were also tasty. Wasabi was the best I've ever had. The dessert was also super. Let alone the super-nice and friendly waitress!
I don't usually give 5 Stars ratings, but this restaurant just offered a great lunch experience.
Highly recommended!
Staff is always extremely friendly. Quality of the food is consistently good. It’s tasty and they often have good deals through their newsletter.
One of the best sushi restorant in Basel. I advise this restorant.
Sushi is okay, but the price is not really justified.

It's a good sushi place, located 5 minutes away from the central train station: the plates with a mix of sushis were good and tasty. Friendly and smiling staff and very quick service. Japanese beer was good as well.
This place is just a bit pricey in my opinion (even for Switzerland).

The price is not cheap therefore I was expecting a high quality Sushi
The fish taste is not fresh ( or maybe the way is treated is not the best ? )
The rice doesn't taste like a high standard sushi place.
When I try some sushi or Onigiri from any convenience store in Japan ( which is very cheap) the quality surpasses this restaurant's main product by far .

Price is good not expensive, the place is not so clean, windows tables, the back door really in not good conditions, when you seat out-side, all the outside is a mess, and you wait forever to be served, the warn soap was cold. Service is not amazing depends of the person and the day, they could be an excellent restaurant, but they don’t have a serving police, or a cleaning hight standard.

I don’t recommend this place. The salmon and tuna sashimi look so unappetizing that I almost couldn’t  eat it. But I was hungry and it costs 24.- so I ate it. Absolutely tasteless. I just don’t understand. Sashimi involve no cooking at all. So serve at least fresh and good looking ones. Service was slow and minimal.  Never again.
Fresh sushi and wonderful fusion flavours. Negishi is one of the safest bets for good Sushi in Basel.
Great snack! The soups are excellent!

In this period of quarantine, we decided to order sushi for a change. We decided to go for Negishi as our provider. Even though we made  the order (Kinmekki - plate for 3) in advance (more than 3hrs in advance and the delivery was off the peak period) the delivery guys arrived very late and the sushi didn't look good nor smelled good. The Nigiri Shake and Nigiri Maguro stinked like rotten fish and the Nigiri Maguro looked almost dehydrated.
Moreover, the rice in all makis looked dried. I opened a couple of them to confirm it and that hold true.
We decided not to eat because of the BAD QUALITY AND OVERPRICED SERVICE and of being affraid of getting sick. If I had a 0 start to give I would.

I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO ANYONE.

Fantastic Sushi! They have a great variety of Tastes. The Rice is always perfectly cooked the salmon melts in your mouth!
EAT • SMILE • ENJOY! :))
Used to be one of the best sushi places in Basel. New focus on mass production has lowered quality massively. Complete lack of respect for what Sushi is supposed to be.
Good food however bit expensive.
Great food. Great service and a lot of original sushi. Monday is the cheap day so head on out. We'll worth the trip!

Rather boring menu and too expensive for what it is.
They also mix and match within the individual plates, that’s a big no for sushi trains
Lots of coffees going around the train...
Not going back.
I loved it so much and am craving to go back again 😁
Delicious and fresh sushi and sashimi in a cute little restaurant tucked away in the alleys in Basel's CBD. Pricey (as all things are in Switzerland) but would go back for sure.
Very good fusion sushi and nice environment. Usually packed, so reserve in advance is possible.
Terrible sushi and way overpriced. All the fish was old looking, not much variety, and the dumpling skins were broken and soggy.
Junky untrained male waiter. Taste of food is average. Not recommended. Plenty of Sushi restaurants and bars within walking distance

Beautiful Italian chef, amazing sushi place and food, great service!
See you back soon

Beer came in less than a minute; this is how it should be done !!
Outdoor seating too !!
Relished the sushi here.
They have amazing sushi with probably the best sit down ambience
i gave it 4 stars but it is 3.5 i was a tourist in Basel but i am sure there were better sushi places in the city. Average
Absolutely overpriced. Two Eastern Europeans making sushi rolls with the help of a machine. Fish quality is average. Never again.
Reasonable sushi and service. Decent atmosphere for a chilled meal
Great sushis, but too expensive !!!! And 6.- per BAGGED green tea ?! This is crazy. We won’t be going back.
This is one of the best Shusi bars in Basel. Perfect location, we can go for a lunch with colleagues, middle of the city...
Best Suchi in Basel Stadt 👍. Good quality and good service. Small restaurant and take out available
Very nice sushi :)
Friendly staff. Very good Sushi. Pricy for the tke away ambiente.
Good place for a fast lunch or take away. Even better since they put a lot of new stuff on the menu.
Food is delicious like in all Negishi Restaurant.... Including absolutly friendly personal and clean toilet.
Friendly service and very tasty sushi! Try the homemade ginger tea!
I had an absolutely lovely vegan sushi setup!
Decent food, friendly staff and great location at mid-price range of Switzerland. Not bad.

The Bento Box is excellent and the price is fair.
They have the best California Rolls oin town.
No good sushi in this country. No fresh fish. But here it is ok. Pleasant
Top sushi! Mega fein. 10/10 would go again

Nice sushi restaurant, they have a sushi train
More as a treat, not for a big meal
Very good sushi !  Friendly staff. Normal price rate for Basel.
Nice to eat at the sushi bar
The best sushi I have ever ate!!
Very good sushi bar, small size restaurant, good products!
Good Japanese food, but I had better and less expensive.
Quick service, friendly staff..and great sushi!
excellent sushi. make sure to have a reservation
Nice food, never had a tea bag in gin before. Expensive!
Top!
Awesome fresh food and nice service. A recommended address in Basel!
Awesome sushi and they are very friendly and helpful!
We're just crazy over their Sushi's,sashimi and calamansi hot tea
Good food, easy to directly talk to the Chef for any extras
Average place with ok sushi, quality is 5/10
great service, great food but quite expensive
Quite a good sushi restaurant, quite pricy though
Best sushi in town! But at a price...
nice place for sushi
Good service and food
Nice
Interesting combinations of sushi, cheaper on mondays :)
Sushi OK, service quite bad, quite expensive
Top
Super Sushi, netter Service :)
Amazing diversity of sushi!
A bit pricy for the sushi on offer.
Top!
Best service and sushi
Very good quality and prices
Very good food. Good quality
Best sushi in town!!
Best Sushi at town!! I❤it!!
Expensive compared to the quality which was not really great.
Best Sushi ever!!
Good fresh sushi.
Sushi!
Good sushi. Long sushi train
Negishi Sushi I Love it😁😁
Raw fish wrapped around a ball of cold rice.
the quality and the price is good
Great fresh yummy food
Quality of the fish was okay
Decent sushi
Good sushi
Top
Top
Top
Yum!
Great sushi!!!
Expensive but good

(Translated by Google) Ultra friendly service & service, very courteous! The sushi selection and quality leaves nothing to be desired. The menu card is graphically very nice and clearly designed. We were very satisfied and ate really well. In terms of price, everything is in the upper level, but I think that has to do with the central location.

(Original)
Ultra freundliche Bedienung & Service, sehr zuvorkommend! Die Sushi-Auswahl und Qualität lässt nichts zu wünschen übrig. Auch die Menü-Karte ist grafisch sehr schön & klar gestaltet. Waren sehr zufrieden und haben echt gut gegessen. Preislich bewegt sich alles im oberen Niveau, aber ich denke das hat mit dem zentralen Standort zu tun.

(Translated by Google) The sushi and ice pop were delicious. I was there for the first time and will definitely come again. Very friendly staff and a great atmosphere.
Many Thanks

(Original)
Das Sushi und das Eis-Pop waren super lecker. Ich war zum 1 Mal dort und werde auf jedenfall nochmals kommen. Sehr freundliches Personal und ein tolles Ambiente.
Vielen Dank

(Translated by Google) Very friendly staff. Very fine studio ... I could enjoy it for hours ... if only it wasn't that expensive. I would love to come back. I've always seen on Mondays the sushi on tape are cheaper. The iced tea was particularly good, by the way.

(Original)
Sehr freundliches Personal. Sehr feines Studio... ich könnte stundenlang genießen... wenn es nur nicht so teuer wäre. Komme gerne wieder. Habe gesehen immer Montags gibt es die Sushi s auf Band günstiger. Der Eistee war übrigens besonders gut.

(Translated by Google) Dear Negishi (Basel Steinen) team
Thank you for being served so well by you this year. Every order was always correct and tasted really good. In the restaurant we always had friendly and very good service. The quality of the sushi, respectively. des Fisch is sensational and I can only recommend it to everyone. I myself eat at least every 1-2 weeks in this restaurant and can only say positive things about it.
Thanks very much!
Warm greetings

(Original)
Liebes Negishi (Basel Steinen) Team
Vielen Dank, dass ich dieses Jahr so toll von euch bedient worden bin. Jede Bestellung war immer korrekt und hat mega gut geschmeckt. Im Restaurant hatten wir immer sympathische und sehr gute Bedienung. Die Qualität der Sushi‘s resp. des Fisches ist sensationell und kann ich nur jedem weiterempfehlen. Ich selber esse mind. alle 1-2 Wochen in diesem Restaurant und kann nur positiv darüber berichten.
Vielen Dank!
Liebe Grüsse

(Translated by Google) We have a lot of sushi experience and this is number 1.
clean place, with very friendly staff and high quality products.

(Original)
Wir haben viel Sushi-Erfahrung und das ist die Nummer 1.
sauberes Lokal, mit sehr freundlichem Personal und qualitativ hochwertigen Produkten.

(Translated by Google) The new ordering concept using a QR code is totally wrong and discriminates against everyone who doesn't have a smartphone. In addition, it is confusing compared to the menu card and you can no longer see any connections. I have also observed that the guests are even more on their cell phones than usual. Ultimately, it is also at the expense of the staff, who lose their job in the next step, since the app then has to be paid in advance. So the whole ambiance is lost and everything is cold and impersonal.

(Original)
Das neue Bestellkonzept über einen QR-Code ist total daneben und diskriminiert alle, welche kein Smartphone haben. Zudem ist es im Vergleich mit der Menükarte unübersichtlich und man sieht keine Zusammenhänge mehr. Ich habe auch beobachtet, dass die Gäste noch mehr am Handy hängen als sonst üblich. Schlussendlich geht es auch auf Kosten des Personals, welches im nächsten Schritt den Job verlieren, da dann auch über die App im Voraus bezahlt werden muss. So geht auch das ganze Ambiente verloren und alles ist kalt und unpersönlich.

(Translated by Google) You just have to do it. Yummy👏

(Original)
Muss man einfach mal gemacht haben. Lecker👏

(Translated by Google) A great restaurant. The sushi course is particularly noteworthy. Sushi lovers should definitely join this one. Super quality, super explained and above all super delicious. In addition to preparing your own sushi in various forms, you can also get great tips and tricks from the Negishi team, who are always on hand to help. In this sense itadakimasu !!

(Original)
Ein super Restaurant. Der Sushi-Kurs  ist besonders hervorzuheben. Sushi-Liebhaber sollten diesen unbedingt mitmachen. Super Qualität, super erklärt und vor allem super lecker. Neben der eigenen Zubereitung von sushi in verschiedenster Form erhält man noch großartige Tipps und Tricks vom Negishi-Team, welches immer freundlich zur Seite steht. In diesem Sinne itadakimasu!!

(Translated by Google) A top address! Very nice restaurant with very friendly service. In addition to the sushi line, the restaurant offers creative and exquisite dishes from the menu. Prices at the upper limit, but ok for the quality.

(Original)
Eine Top-Adresse! Sehr schönes Lokal mit sehr freundlichem Service. Nebst dem Sushi-Band bietet das Restaurant kreative und exquisite Gerichte aus der Karte. Preise zwar am oberen Limit, für die Qualität aber ok.

(Translated by Google) The food was quite good, waiting and pick up time ok, but charging 4 carafes of still tap water 40 francs would be all about focus.

(Original)
La nourriture était assez bonne, le temps d’attente et de prise en charge correct, mais faire payer 4 carafes d’eau plate du robinet 40 francs, il s’agirait de se concentrer.

(Translated by Google) It's always a pleasure to go to Negishi. Great food, great environment and most importantly great service. Child friendly too. Thanks for always making us smile and feeling at home.

It's always a pleasure to eat at Negishi. Good food, pleasant atmosphere and most importantly the service is sensational. You are also child-friendly. Thank you for always warmly welcoming us.

(Original)
It’s always a pleasure to go to Negishi. Great food, great environment and most importantly great service. Child friendly too. Thanks for always making us smile and feeling at home.

Es ist immer eine Freude bei Negishi essen zu gehen. Gutes essen, angenehme Atmosphäre und am wichtigsten der Service ist sensationel. Kinderfreundlich sind Sie auch. Danke das Ihr uns immer herzlichst Willkommen heisst.

(Translated by Google) Super friendly service. The different sushi are amazing. The nice thing is that it has a large selection of sushi. Keep it up!

(Original)
Super freundlicher Service. Die verschiedenen Sushi sind der Wahnsinn. Das schöne ist, dass es eine grosse Auswahl an Sushi hat. Weiter so!

(Translated by Google) Always super friendly service, and super delicious and fresh food. Perfect for meeting friends at the sushi bar or ordering something online for take away

(Original)
Stets super freundliche Bedienung, und super leckeres und frisches Essen. Perfekt um sich mit Freunden an der Sushi Bar zu treffen oder online etwas fürs take away zu bestellen

(Translated by Google) Delicious and a great variety of food. Totally nice staff. The toilets are clean. There are tampons, pads and others. and even razors in the ladies' room. Great service. We will be back. 👍

(Original)
Sehr lecker und eine große Auswahl an Speisen. Total nettes Personal. Die Toiletten sind sauber. Dort gibt es Tampons, Binden u.a. und sogar Rasierer auf der Damentoilette. Toller Service. Wir kommen gerne wieder. 👍

(Translated by Google) Very good quality, nice ambience.

(Original)
Sehr gute Qualität, nettes Ambiente.

(Translated by Google) The Negishi doesn't serve authentic Japanese food in my eyes. The quality of the food is okay, but neither the taste nor the preparation are Japanese. If you like fusion kitchen with various Asian influences (Thai, Chinese, Korean) and modern and contemporary furnishings, this is the right place. The service was hard-working and friendly.

(Original)
Das Negishi serviert in meinen Augen kein authentisches japanisches Essen. Die Qualität der Speisen ist in Ordnung, doch weder der Geschmack noch die Zubereitung sind japanisch. Wer gerne Fusion kitchen mit diversen asiatischen Einschlägen (Thai, Chinesisch, Koreanisch) und moderne und zeitgemässe Einrichtung mag, ist hier richtig. Der Service war bemüht und freundlich.

(Translated by Google) As regular guests, we were never disappointed. Good sushi and always new dessert creations. Top

(Original)
Als regelmässige Gäste wurden wir nie enttäuscht. Gutes Sushi und immer wieder neue Dessert-Kreationen. Top

(Translated by Google) Incredibly good sushi, always buy it here, priced a bit high but it's worth it. Top quality, super friendly

(Original)
Unfassbares gutes Sushi, kaufe es immer hier, preisliche schon bisschen hoch aber es lohnt sich . Top Qualität, mega freundlich

(Translated by Google) Great service and fresh sushi, modern location :)
Always a nice experience. I'm looking forward to the new sushi creations!

(Original)
Toller Service und frische Sushi, moderne Location :)
Immer wieder ein schönes Erlebnis. Bin gespannt auf die neuen Sushi creationen!

(Translated by Google) Like all negishi restaurants the quality of the food is terrific. The personnel is very friendly and courteous.
The highlight is the sushi circle!!

(Original)
Wie alle negishi restaurants ist die qualität des essens grandios. Das personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Das highlight ist der sushi circle!!

(Translated by Google) Super fast turnaround time for takeout orders (as soon as possible) and great service when dining in the restaurant.

(Original)
Superschnelle Bearbeitungszeit für Bestellungen zum Mitnehmen (so bald wie möglich) und toller Service beim Essen im Restaurant.

(Translated by Google) Delicious good quality sushi. Price-performance ratio is right

(Original)
Leckeres Sushi von guter Qualität. Preis-Leistung stimmt

(Translated by Google) I pre-ordered everything on the internet! At the specified time the sushii was ready and I could enjoy it! Thank you very much

(Original)
Habe im Internet alles vorbestellt! Zu angegebener Zeit war das Sushii bereit und ich konnte es geniessen! Vielen Dank absolut genial

(Translated by Google) For me the best sushi far and wide .. simply always top quality👌🏼

(Original)
Für mich das beste Sushi weit und breit.. einfach immer Top Qualität👌🏼

(Translated by Google) Top service, great quality.

(Original)
Top Bedienung, super Qualität.

(Translated by Google) Good service and extremely good food.
I like to come to eat regularly and to end the day.

(Original)
Gute Bedienung und äusserst gutes Essen.
Komme regelmässig gerne zum essen und den Tag ausklingen zu lassen.

(Translated by Google) Ideally placed, succulent sushi and an incredible variety of choices! The service was very nice and we were able to take with us the sushi that we had not managed to finish. Despite the price a little high, I highly recommend!

(Original)
Idéalement placé, des sushis succulents et une variété de choix incroyable! Le service était très gentil et nous avons pu prendre avec nous les sushis que nous n'avions pas réussi à terminer. Malgré le prix un petit peu élevé je recommande vivement!

(Translated by Google) As always good and tasty. The ginger tea is way too overpriced. Hence one star less.

(Original)
Wie immer gut und lecker. Der Ingwertee ist viel zu überteuert. Daher ein Stern weniger.

(Translated by Google) As always it was delicious and the service is very nice!
We would be happy to come again!

(Original)
War wie immer super lecker und auch die Bedienung ist sehr nett!!!!
Gerne kommen wir wieder!

(Translated by Google) Delicious sushi and I think the price-performance ratio is right for the price ratios in Switzerland

(Original)
Leckeres Sushi und ich finde das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis stimmt für die Preisverhältnisse in der Schweiz

(Translated by Google) Very tasty Suhsi and recommendable. Test the fine taste for yourself ;-)

(Original)
Sehr leckeres Suhsi und empfehlenswert. Teste selbst den feinen Geschmack ;-)

(Translated by Google) Very smiling waitress, modern setting and excellent sushi.

(Original)
Serveuse très souriante, cadre moderne et excellents sushis.

(Translated by Google) No insider tip but by far my favorite restaurant! Super friendly service, great atmosphere, delicious food, good Teevariationen (usually drink green tea) What more could you ask for?

(Original)
Kein Geheimtipp mehr aber mit Abstand mein lieblings Restaurant! Super freundliche Bedienung, tolles Ambiente, leckeres Essen, gute Teevariationen (trinke meist Grüntee dazu) Was will man mehr?

(Translated by Google) For me the best sushi ever. Delicious, friendly, great ambience🤗

(Original)
Für mich das beste Sushi überhaupt. Lecker, freundlich, tolles Ambiente🤗

(Translated by Google) friendly and all-round great, we would love to come back🙏🤗

(Original)
freundlich und rundum alles Top, wir kommen sehr gerne wieder🙏🤗

(Translated by Google) Very nice staff, quality of the take away simply unbeatable 👌🏻

(Original)
Sehr nettes Personal, Qualität vom take away einfach unschlagbar 👌🏻

(Translated by Google) The food is good. I think this branch is the best in Basel

(Original)
Das essen ist gut. Ich finde diese Filiale ist die beste in Basel

(Translated by Google) Best sushi in town. Always worth a trip❤️

(Original)
Das Beste Sushi in der Stadt. Immer eine Reise Wert❤️

(Translated by Google) super delicious, super team, super hospitality, fast delivery, fully satisfied

(Original)
super lecker, super Team, super Bewirtung, schnelle Lieferung, voll und ganz zufrieden

(Translated by Google) Fresh fish, freshly prepared, what more could you want?
Great team, friendly service and on Monday all plates for 5.80 am Kaiten.

(Original)
Frischer Fisch, frisch zubereitet, was will man mehr?
Tolles Team, freundliche Bedienung und am Montag immer alle Teller für 5.80 am Kaiten.

(Translated by Google) Excellent and innovative sushi! Offers varieties that you can't get everywhere. The service is very friendly and attentive. Unfortunately in winter now a little drafty when the door opens and new guests come. Maybe a thick curtain on the door ?!
But still happy to visit at any time!

(Original)
Hervorragendes und innovatives Sushi! Bietet Sorten an welche man nicht überall bekommt. Der Service ist sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Leider im Winter jetzt etwas zugig wenn die Tür aufgeht und neue Gäste kommen. Vielleicht ein dicker Vorhang an die Tür?!
Aber trotzdem gerne jederzeit wider ein Besuch wert!

(Translated by Google) Friendly staff and great food..!
I'd love to come back ;)

(Original)
Freundliches Personal und das Essen Top..!
Komme gerne wieder ;)

(Translated by Google) Very friendly staff and very tasty sushi.

(Original)
Sehr freundliches Personal und dazu sehr leckeres Sushi.

(Translated by Google) For me the best sushi far and wide

(Original)
Für mich das beste Sushi weit und breit

(Translated by Google) Great sushi and very nice and courteous service!

(Original)
Super Sushi und sehr nette und zuvorkommende Bedienung!

(Translated by Google) Very tasty as always. top top

(Original)
Sehr Lecker wie immer. Top top

(Translated by Google) Food good, service underground

I wanted to have dinner with colleagues at 8pm in Negishi im Steinen on November 12th. Only the service told us that we were only allowed to order certain things and to make them the same. When we got the food we weren't allowed to order any more or other drinks like a panache. The service was too busy cleaning up and just wanted to go home instead of entertaining guests decently. The entrance is open until 11pm, but all guests should be gone by 9:30 pm. I thought during the Corona period the restaurateurs would be happy when they were allowed to greet and entertain guests, so that was probably not the case. Too bad. Then only delivery service.

(Original)
Essen gut, Service unterirdisch

Ich wollte am 12.11 mit Kollegen um 20 in Negishi im Steinen essen. Nur hat uns der Service erklärt, dass wir nur bestimmte Sachen bestellen durften und sie gleich zu machen. Als wir das Essen bekamen, durften wir nicht mehr bestellen oder weitere Getränke wie ein Panache. Der Service war zu beschäftigt mit Aufräumen und wollten nur nach Hause gehen, anstatt die Gäste anständig zu bewirten. Vorm Eingang steht zwar bis 23 offen, aber um 21:30 sollte alle Gäste weg sein. Ich dachte während der Corona Zeit seien die Gastronomen froh, wenn Sie Gäste begrüssen und bewirten dürfen, demnach war das wohl nicht so. Schade. Dann nur Lieferdienst.

(Translated by Google) Extremely good sushi, although not cheap.

(Original)
Extrem gutes Sushi, auch wenn nicht ganz günstig.

(Translated by Google) I go to Negishi twice, three times a month. I would not necessarily call myself a regular customer and yet recognize most of the employees again and bring me my favorite drink. Nice and uncomplicated staff. Sushi itself fine, better than in other places in Basel. Clear recommendation

(Original)
Ich gehe so zwei, drei mal im Monat ins Negishi. Würde mich nicht unbedingt als Stammkunde bezeichnen und trotzdem erkennen mich die meisten Angestellten wieder und bringen mir gleich mein Lieblingsgetränk. Nettes und unkompliziertes Personal. Sushi selber auch fein, besser als in anderen Orten in Basel. Klare Empfehlung

(Translated by Google) Mostly good unfortunately things are forgotten now and then but otherwise mostly fresh

(Original)
Meistens gut leider werden ab und zu dinge vergessen aber sonst meistens frisch

(Translated by Google) Everything was great, would recommend it to everyone, good service

(Original)
Alles top würde es jedem weiterempfehlen gute Bedienung

(Translated by Google) Price performance far wrong in my opinion. Sushi somehow just put together without love. Roll with dry tuna salad eg .... Sashimi was on the belt for far too long, it was very warm and dried. I won't go to this restaurant anytime soon! Kind regards

(Original)
Preis Leistung weit daneben meiner Meinung nach. Sushi ohne Liebe einfach nur irgendwie zusammengestellt. Roll mit trocken Thunfischsalat zb.... Sashimi befand sich viel zu lange am Band war scho sehr warm und angetrocknet. Ich werde dieses Restaurant nicht mehr so schnell aufsuchen! Mfg

(Translated by Google) 👑 Sushi King of Switzerland 👑

Best sushi bar far and wide!
A lot of creations to choose from. The taste is very, very tasty and fresh.

The restaurant is nicely decorated and you feel comfortable - it is not big a few tables and a bar with a treadmill where you can help yourself. It is served at the tables. In summer you can also sit outside. The staff is very friendly.

Reservation an advantage - a must for several people. Otherwise it may be that there is no space.

(Original)
👑 Sushi King of Switzerland 👑

Beste Sushibar weit und breit!
Sehr viele Kreationen zur Auswahl. Geschmacklich sehr sehr lecker und frisch.

Das Lokal ist schön eingerichtet und man fühlt sich wohl - es ist nicht gross ein paar Tischchen und eine Bar mit Laufband wo man sich bedienen kann. An den Tischen wird serviert. Im Sommer kann man auch draussen sitzen. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

Reservation von Vorteil - bei mehreren Personen ein muss. Sonst kann es sein, dass es kein Platz hat.

(Translated by Google) Very good sushi. Good selection and very fresh and tasty. One star deduction for the price. It's very expensive, especially if you still have children who also like to eat sushi. I tried various cheap ones in Alsace, but none of them got to Negishi. A little tip should be full here, in Gerbergasse there is a smaller one, which almost always offers space and is equally good.

(Original)

Ich habe diverse billerige im Elsass probiert, jedoch ist keines an Negishi rangekommen. Kleiner Tipp sollte hier voll sein, in der Gerbergasse hat es noch ein kleineres, welches fast immer Platz bietet und auch gleich gut schmekt.

(Translated by Google) Yesterday I was eating here with my partner. The restaurant was full. But the short wait was definitely worth it! 👍 The food and the service was just perfect because of the professionalism of the staff. We enjoyed our sushi very much and come back just because of the great service.

Ich war Gestern mit meiner Partnerin hier essen.  Das Restaurant war voll besetzt. Doch das kurze Warten hat sich definitiv gelohnt!👍 Das Essen und auch der Service war aufgrund der proffessionalität der Angestellten einfach perfekt. Trotz dem fühlbar hohen Stresslevels (durch eine unverständlicherweise unzufriedene Kundin, welche sich daneben benommen hatte, Fremdschämen inklusive)waren alle mehr als freundlich und zuvorkommend. It is very likely that the sushi will not be freshly prepared, as everything was stone cold and inedible. I wanted to get up and go after my first bite. A real disappointment for lovers of authentic sushi / ramen.

Das Sushi wird mit grosser Wahrscheinlichkeit nicht frisch zubereitet, da alles steinkalt und ungeniessbar war. Am liebsten wäre ich nach meinem ersten Bissen aufgestanden und gegangen. Für Liebhaber von authentischem Sushi/Ramen eine einzige Enttäuschung.
